name: NetPlay
0:
”Alexa, channel up on Cable”
”Alexa, turn on den”
”Alexa, turn up the volume on TV”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Full Alexa voice control for your NetPlay Home, NetPlay Pro, or standalone IrUSB system. Please see www.video-storm.com for details on the NetPlay AV distribution system.

NetPlay brings you a full featured AV distribution and control system using your FireTV devices and your home network.
